task: Create a Python function that validates email addresses using regular expressions and provides detailed error messages for invalid formats.
specification: Write a Python function `validate_email(email: str) -> tuple[bool, str]` that returns (is_valid, error_message). The function should check for: proper local part format, valid domain, no consecutive dots, proper @ symbol placement, and common TLD validation. Provide specific error messages for each type of failure.

task: Design and implement a REST API for a task management system with authentication, CRUD operations, and rate limiting.
specification: Create a Flask-based REST API with endpoints for: user registration/login, task CRUD (create, read, update, delete), task assignment, and progress tracking. Include JWT authentication, input validation, rate limiting (100 requests/minute), and comprehensive error handling. Use SQLAlchemy for database operations.

task: Implement a binary search tree with insert, delete, and search operations, including balancing functionality.
specification: Create a BST class in Python with methods: insert(value), delete(value), search(value), inorder_traversal(), and balance(). The tree should automatically rebalance using AVL rotations when height difference exceeds 1. Include comprehensive error handling and unit tests.

task: Create a web scraper that extracts product information from e-commerce sites while handling anti-bot measures.
specification: Build a Python scraper using Selenium/BeautifulSoup that can navigate product pages, extract name, price, rating, and availability. Handle JavaScript-rendered content, CAPTCHAs, rate limits, and IP rotation. Include proxy support and user-agent rotation. Store results in JSON/CSV format.

task: Debug and fix a memory leak in a Python data processing application.
error_description: Memory usage increases linearly with file size, objects never garbage collected, potential file handle leaks
task: Identify memory leaks, fix them, and optimize for processing large files (100MB+). Add memory monitoring and proper resource cleanup.
Design a microservices architecture for a real-time chat application with WebSocket support.
specification: Design and implement microservices for: authentication, chat message routing, presence management, and message history. Use WebSocket for real-time communication, Redis for pub/sub, PostgreSQL for persistence, and Docker for containerization. Include service discovery, load balancing, and circuit breakers.

task: Implement a caching layer for a database query system with TTL and cache invalidation.
specification: Create a Python caching system that sits between application and database. Support multiple cache backends (Redis, Memcached, in-memory), implement TTL with sliding expiration, cache invalidation on data updates, and cache warming strategies. Include metrics and monitoring.

task: Build a machine learning pipeline for text classification with model training and evaluation.
specification: Create an end-to-end ML pipeline using scikit-learn/TensorFlow. Include data preprocessing, feature extraction, model training (multiple algorithms), cross-validation, hyperparameter tuning, and performance evaluation. Add model versioning and A/B testing capabilities.

task: Create a configuration management system with environment-specific settings and validation.
specification: Build a Python config system that supports YAML/JSON files, environment variable overrides, schema validation, and nested configuration merging. Include encryption for sensitive values, configuration hot-reloading, and comprehensive error reporting.

task: Implement a distributed task queue system with worker pools and job prioritization.
specification: Create a task queue system using Celery/RabbitMQ. Support multiple priority levels, delayed execution, retry logic with exponential backoff, dead letter queues, and worker health monitoring. Include job dependencies and batch processing capabilities.

task: Write a JavaScript function that implements debouncing for search input with caching.
specification: Create a JavaScript function `debounceSearch(func, delay)` that returns a debounced version. Include search result caching, keyboard event handling, and proper cleanup. Support both immediate and delayed execution modes.

task: Design and implement a blockchain-based voting system with smart contracts.
specification: Create Ethereum smart contracts for a secure voting system. Include voter registration, proposal creation, voting mechanisms, and result tallying. Implement delegation, time-locked voting, and protection against Sybil attacks. Add frontend for interaction.

task: Create a data visualization dashboard using D3.js with real-time updates.
specification: Build an interactive dashboard using D3.js that displays multiple chart types (line, bar, pie, scatter). Support real-time data updates via WebSocket, responsive design, and user interactions (zoom, filter, drill-down). Include export functionality.

task: Implement a natural language processing system for sentiment analysis with custom models.
specification: Create an NLP pipeline for sentiment analysis using Python. Include text preprocessing (tokenization, stemming, stop-word removal), feature extraction (TF-IDF, word embeddings), model training (SVM, neural networks), and evaluation. Handle multiple languages and domain adaptation.

task: Build a file upload service with virus scanning and thumbnail generation.
specification: Create a file upload service in Node.js/Express that supports multiple file types, implements virus scanning using ClamAV, generates thumbnails for images/videos, stores files in cloud storage (S3), and provides a REST API for file management.

task: Design a GraphQL API with subscription support for real-time data.
specification: Create a GraphQL API using Apollo Server that supports queries, mutations, and subscriptions. Implement real-time data updates via GraphQL subscriptions, authentication middleware, rate limiting, and database integration with PostgreSQL. Include schema stitching.

task: Implement a priority queue with multiple priority levels and heap-based operations.
specification: Create a priority queue data structure in Python that supports multiple priority levels, dynamic priority updates, heap-based implementation for O(log n) operations, and bulk operations. Include thread-safety and performance monitoring.

task: Create a mobile app for expense tracking with offline support and synchronization.
specification: Build a React Native app for expense tracking with offline-first design, local SQLite storage, cloud synchronization, receipt OCR, category-based budgeting, and multi-currency support. Include biometric authentication and data export.

task: Write a SQL query optimizer that suggests index improvements for slow queries.
specification: Create a Python tool that analyzes SQL queries, identifies missing indexes, suggests optimal index strategies, and provides performance improvement estimates. Support multiple database engines (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server) and explain plan analysis.

task: Implement a distributed logging system with aggregation and search capabilities.
specification: Create a distributed logging system using ELK stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana). Support log collection from multiple services, real-time aggregation, full-text search, alerting on error patterns, and dashboard visualization.

task: Create a Python decorator for retry logic with exponential backoff and circuit breaking.
specification: Implement a decorator `@retry_with_backoff` that supports configurable retry attempts, exponential backoff delays, jitter for thundering herd prevention, circuit breaker pattern, and comprehensive logging of retry attempts.

task: Build a video streaming service with adaptive bitrate and CDN integration.
specification: Create a video streaming service using HLS/DASH that supports adaptive bitrate based on network conditions, CDN integration for global distribution, DRM protection, and analytics. Include transcoding pipeline and thumbnail generation.

task: Implement a graph algorithm library with shortest path and minimum spanning tree.
specification: Create a Python graph library supporting directed/undirected graphs, weighted edges, Dijkstra's algorithm for shortest paths, Kruskal's algorithm for MST, and visualization. Include comprehensive unit tests and performance benchmarks.

task: Design an IoT data processing pipeline with real-time analytics and anomaly detection.
specification: Create an IoT data pipeline using Apache Kafka/Pulsar for streaming, Apache Flink for real-time processing, machine learning for anomaly detection, and dashboard for visualization. Support device management and alerting.

task: Write a CSS-in-JS library for component styling with theme support.
specification: Create a CSS-in-JS library that supports component-based styling, theme switching (light/dark/custom), CSS-in-JS syntax, style isolation, and performance optimization. Include TypeScript definitions and comprehensive docs.

task: Implement a peer-to-peer file sharing system with encryption and discovery.
specification: Create a P2P file sharing system using WebRTC for direct connections, encryption for file security, distributed hash table for discovery, and resume support. Include NAT traversal and bandwidth optimization.

task: Create a Redis-based session store with clustering and failover.
specification: Implement a session store using Redis with clustering support, automatic failover, session persistence, and cleanup. Include security features, session analytics, and admin interface.

task: Build a machine learning model serving system with A/B testing and monitoring.
specification: Create an ML model serving system using TensorFlow Serving/KFServing. Support multiple model versions, A/B testing for model comparison, real-time monitoring, automatic rollback, and canary deployments.

task: Implement a JavaScript promise utility library with timeout and cancellation.
specification: Create a promise utility library supporting timeout, cancellation tokens, promise composition (all, race, any), retry logic, and comprehensive error handling. Include TypeScript definitions and tree-shaking support.

task: Design a serverless function orchestration system with workflow management.
specification: Create a serverless workflow system using AWS Step Functions/Temporal. Support complex workflows, parallel execution, error handling, retries, and human-in-the-loop tasks. Include visualization and monitoring.
